pullRequest.title: Fix small nits in method names and patterns we use in metrics SDK

nodes.bodyText: I think it reads a little better to have these helper methods, rather than requiring callers to look for nulls.

commit.message:
Fix small nits in method names and patterns we use in metrics SDK

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Drutu <bogdandrutu@gmail.com>
